title: Understanding cancer (TEFC)
creator_credit: Roger Hudson, Jim Dale and ABC-TV (Australia)
brief_description: By considering two basic questions, what is cancer? and what is the cause of cancer?, this program attempts to lay at rest many of the myths about this disease. A very comprehensive coverage of the nature of cancer, epidemiology and carcinogens. Presented by Professor Richard Fox, Ludwig Institute for Cancer Research, University of Sydney.
